title: initiativeActor
description: An actor taking part in an initiative

id.description: The id of the initiative actor.

initiativeId.description: The id of the initiative the actor belongs to.

initiativeActorGroupId.description: The id of the initiative actor group the actor belongs to.

userId.description: The discord id of the user who controls the actor

characterId.description: The id of the character that this actor represents

referenceNpcName.description: The name of the npc that this actor represents

createdAt.description: When the initiative was first started

lastUpdatedAt.description: When the initiative was last interacted with
